channel.title: Trade button (disconnection)
channel.description: Okay when I trade on my server it doesnt disconnect until some one offers sumthing and then it just freezes and u have to refresh the page. The iteam u went to trade it will show it all light like u kno how when u press on it and hold it. Does any one know wut cud be causing this error? thanks =]

item.title: Trade button (disconnection)

@crip_4_lyfe wrote:

Okay when I trade on my server it doesnt disconnect until some one offers sumthing and then it just freezes and u have to refresh the page. The iteam u went to trade it will show it all light like u kno how when u press on it and hold it.
Does any one know wut cud be causing this error?
thanks =]
